alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Decatur (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson, southwestern Benton, southeastern Carroll and northern Decatur Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wildersville, or near Natchez Trace State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Parkers Crossroads, Wildersville, Parker`s Cross Roads, Jeannette, Union Cross, Holladay, Sugar Tree, Timberlake, Hickory Forks, Yuma, Cozette and Bible Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
